title: LAUNCH WITNESS PASS
intro: The launch of SSLV-D1/EOS-02 Mission is scheduled for Sunday, August 7, 2022 at 9:18 am (IST) from Satish Dhawan Space Centre (SDSC), Sriharikota.

features.The launch of SSLV: D1/EOS-02 Mission is scheduled for Sunday, August 7, 2022 at 9:18 am (IST) from Satish Dhawan Space Centre (SDSC), Sriharikota. ISRO invites citizens to the Launch View Gallery at SDSC to witness the launch. Registration is open at https://lvg.shar.gov.in/VSCREGISTRATION/index.jsp More Details LAUNCH WITNESS PASS

name: LAUNCH WITNESS PASS
